overview: Boxing has always been a man’s sport, but that doesn’t mean that young twinks don’t have an interest in the appeal of hot, sweaty action between sparring partners – as you’ll very quickly discover in this horned-up escapade on DVD featuring some of the hottest buddies on the Staxus books. Lads like Erik Climber, Timmy Williams and Calum Dean, who simply can’t wait to get inside the ring – if you know what we mean! No doubt about it, these lads are each as handsome as hell and as horny as fuck; and it’s no time at all before they’re donning their gloves for the raw ride of their lives, with holes stuffed to the max as a result. Culminating in a crescendo of ball-busting climaxes to leave the lads soaked as the final bell sounds!
title: Twinks in Gloves
